body_html:
Seems that some problems with lv2 API or with checking if that is allowed.

Because I got the same bug on Google Nexus 4 with Android 5.1 and on Samsung Galaxy Tab S 10.5 (T805) with Android 7.0. And I fixed it while set
useCamera2API = true
in CameraActivity.java:300.

Hope that info will help with fix.

body:
Seems that some problems with lv2 API or with checking if that is allowed. 

Because I got the same bug on Google Nexus 4 with Android 5.1 and on Samsung Galaxy Tab S 10.5 (T805) with Android 7.0. And I fixed it while set
`useCamera2API = true`
in CameraActivity.java:300.

Hope that info will help with fix.
